segments.text: Hey man ! How ’ s it hanging ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey man ! Everything is just groovy baby !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you go to the roller rink on Saturday ? I heard it was far out , man !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wanted to , but I ran into this foxy lady that just moved to my block ! I was chatting her up a bit and then we mellowed out at her place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right on , right on ! Well , Jim went to the rink with Sherry and he said it was dy-no-mite ! He was low on bread , but Sherry paid for everything .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gravy ! Jim is such a jive turkey man . He is always hitting me up for cash . Anyway , you wanna book and go grab some grub ?
segments.speaker: S2
